ygData.subject: RE: Question about experience gain
ygData.msgSnippet: He got 100%.  This is a common technique for powerleveling. Elwyn ... From: Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 [mailto:g4mntofcr@SCHOFIELD-EMH1.ARMY.MIL] Sent: Wednesday,
ygData.messageBody:
He got 100%. This is a common technique for powerleveling.


Elwyn

-----Original Message-----
From: Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 [mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
Sent: Wednesday, October 20, 1999 3:19 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Question about experience gain


From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>

The other day I (25 bard) grouped with a 20 druid to take on crag spiders in
East Karana. On a few occasions, we would also fight mobs that were green
to me but blue to the druid. When we killed then, I did not receive
experience points but he did. Lets assume that when we killed a crag
spider, I got 55% of the total experience and he got 45% due to our level
difference. When we killed the mobs that gave me no experience, did he get
100% or 45%? I would guess he only got 45% but want to get a confirmation.


Galtin of E'ci

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@... with
the subject lol.
